thread.title: Tampa’s ViralStyle Joins Fight against Cancer
thread.title_full: Tampa’s ViralStyle Joins Fight against Cancer

title: Tampa’s ViralStyle Joins Fight against Cancer
text:
Tampa’s ViralStyle Joins Fight against Cancer Teams with Moffitt Cancer Center and USF Athletics in Campaign October 13, 2015 08:45 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
TAMPA, Fla.--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- ViralStyle has turned "Bullish" in the fight against cancer. 
The Tampa tech startup is partnering with Moffitt Cancer Center and University of South Florida Athletics in a year-long campaign called, " Bulls Against Cancer ." 
The goal is to bring awareness every month to the different forms of cancer and to promote early detection of the disease. 
October is Breast Cancer Awareness Month and ViralStyle, Moffitt and USF are kicking off the campaign by selling official Pink Moffitt Cancer Center apparel at http://moffitt.viralstyle.com . All proceeds will benefit Moffitt. 
Throughout the 2015-16 athletic season, USF athletes will wear uniforms in the colors associated with the cancer awareness for that month. The four major sports — football, baseball and men's and women's basketball — will host a game dedicated to bringing awareness to a specific cancer. 
For more information, visit MOFFITT.org/Bulls . 
About Viralstyle.com 
Viralstyle is a free social commerce platform that allows anyone to easily create, share, buy and sell their designs on over 50+ apparel and accessories. Upload your design using our proprietary online designer and instantly get a visual that becomes available for purchase. Every design is proofed by a professional artist to ensure it turns out perfectly whether it's being printed on one t-shirt or thousands. From there, Viralstyle handles the inventory, printing, fulfillment, and support of your sale. ViralStyle was founded in August of 2014. The company is based in the Channelside district of Tampa, Florida and is hiring. For more information visit www.viralstyle.com . 
About Moffitt Cancer Center 
Located in Tampa, Moffitt is one of only 45 National Cancer Institute-designated Comprehensive Cancer Centers , a distinction that recognizes Moffitt’s excellence in research, its contributions to clinical trials, prevention and cancer control. Moffitt is the top-ranked cancer hospital in Florida and has been listed in U. S. News & World Report as one of the “Best Hospitals” for cancer care since 1999. With more than 4,600 team members, Moffitt has an economic impact in the state of $1.9 billion. For more information, visit MOFFITT. org , and follow the Moffitt momentum on Facebook , Twitter and YouTube . Contacts
